summary: Defines an abstract base class for Terraform module checks, extending the generic check framework and supplying utility methods to recognize Git-based module sources, extract entity configurations, and retrieve module definitions from Terraform code, while integrating with the module registry.
business_intent: Provide reusable functionality for implementing consistent security and compliance validations on Terraform modules, enabling detection of risky or nonâ€‘compliant module sources and configurations across infrastructure-as-code scans.
